p: Among the plants listed, we found 28 trees, 26 shrubs and undershrubs, 46 herbaceous plants, and 2 bulbs. 79 of these plants are classified as nectariferous and polliniferous; hence, they supply bees with pollen and nectar. 16 are polliniferous and they supply bees with pollen only, 3 are nectariferous and they supply bees with nectar only, 35 are resinous and they supply bees with resin, and 6 are honeydew plants and they supply bees with honeydew [ 14].
